Package io.github.ai4ci.abm

Class Person

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
Abstraction.Entity, Abstraction.HistoricalStateProvider<PersonHistory>, Serializable
@Modifiable public abstract class Person extends Object implements Abstraction.Entity, Abstraction.HistoricalStateProvider<PersonHistory>
The main Person class is a mutable holder that contains immutable data pertaining to baseline, current state, recent history etc.

Implementations are generated by Immutables and are used throughout the simulation to represent individuals, their baseline metadata, and transient state during an update cycle.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createPersonStub

      public static io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiablePerson createPersonStub(Outbreak outbreak)
      Creates a new person and adds them into the outbreak network. The created person is a minimal "stub" instance: it will be assigned an id and outbreak reference; other fields will be initialised with sensible empty values so that the instance can be safely used during network construction.
      Parameters:
      outbreak - the outbreak instance this person will belong to
      Returns:
      a modifiable person stub attached to the provided outbreak

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object another)
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

    • getBaseline

      public abstract PersonBaseline getBaseline()
      Immutable baseline information for this person (e.g. comorbidities, baseline behaviours). This is stable for the duration of a simulation run.
      Returns:
      the PersonBaseline for this person

    • getCurrentHistory

      public Optional<PersonHistory> getCurrentHistory()
      Gets the first history item unless there is no history. If called during update cycle this will get the history at the same time as the current state. If called after it will be the previous day.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the most recent PersonHistory or Optional.empty() if no history exists

    • getCurrentState

      public abstract PersonState getCurrentState()
      The current immutable state of the person for the current simulation timestep. This represents the snapshot of their epidemiological and behavioural state used for computing transitions.
      Returns:
      the current PersonState

    • getDemographic

      public abstract PersonDemographic getDemographic()
      Demographic information for the person such as age group and other population-level stratifiers used in the simulation.
      Returns:
      the PersonDemographic instance

    • getHistory

      public abstract List<PersonHistory> getHistory()
      Reverse time ordered list of historical states (recent first).
      Specified by:
      getHistory in interface Abstraction.HistoricalStateProvider<PersonHistory>
      Returns:
      list of PersonHistory entries in reverse chronological order

    • getId

      public abstract Integer getId()
      The unique numeric identifier for this person within the outbreak network.
      Returns:
      person's id (non-null)

    • getNextHistory

      public abstract Ephemeral<io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder> getNextHistory()
      Only populated during the update cycle largely as a mapping from the t-1 state. Historical events are added most notably test sampling.
      Returns:
      ephemeral builder for next person history

    • getNextState

      public abstract Ephemeral<io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState.Builder> getNextState()
      Only populated during the update cycle, and copied from the t-1 state. This is where changes to the future t state are made.
      Returns:
      ephemeral builder for next person state

    • getOutbreak

      public abstract Outbreak getOutbreak()
      The outbreak this person belongs to. Never null for a created person.
      Returns:
      the associated Outbreak

    • getStateMachine

      public abstract StateMachine getStateMachine()
      The person's behavioural state machine.
      Returns:
      the person's StateMachine for behaviour transitions

    • getUrn

      public String getUrn()
      Returns a persistent unique resource name for this person within the outbreak, used primarily for logging and diagnostics.
      Specified by:
      getUrn in interface Abstraction.Entity
      Returns:
      URN string in the form <outbreak-urn>:person:<id>

    • hashCode

      public final int hashCode()
      Implementations delegate equality and hashing to object identity for mutable persons: these methods are final to prevent accidental redefinition in generated classes.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object

      Returns the URN for this person. This provides a human-friendly representation useful for logging.
